title: CREC Steve Zwinger: Organic wheat/flax intercropping

tasks.task: Conducting an organic farming field tour and discussing historical experimental research on wheat-flax intercropping.
subtasks: Guiding viewers through an organic wheat field.
Explaining the concept of intercropping and its historical context.
Discussing research on wheat-flax intercropping from the 1990s.
Presenting recent experimental results of wheat-flax intercropping under organic conditions.
Highlighting the challenges and potential benefits of flax production in organic farming.
Introducing new varieties and experimental treatments in the current research.
Mentioning the impact of cover crops on the current intercropping trial.
